img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(92\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3c/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2892%29.png)
After the fight with Father of Stones, go through the door and follow the path. You'll come to a cave, which you'll need to pass through to go to the lower level of the valley.
img_below_text:
As you come outside of the cave, you'll need to go left and up a narrow path. At the other end of it, the next element cart blocks your progress.
![Chapter 5 Secret Area \(3\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/16/Chapter_5_Secret_Area_%283%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 2 from the file 'Gray-Bronze_Cart.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(92\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3c/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2892%29.png)
After the fight with Father of Stones, go through the door and follow the path. You'll come to a cave, which you'll need to pass through to go to the lower level of the valley."
            - Following Text: "As you come outside of the cave, you'll need to go left and up a narrow path. At the other end of it, the next element cart blocks your progress.
![Chapter 5 Secret Area \(3\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/16/Chapter_5_Secret_Area_%283%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image:**  
The image depicts a rocky area with eerie stone pillars carved into grotesque faces, creating a foreboding atmosphere. A red arrow points to a character interacting with a wooden cart, suggesting a gameplay moment where the cart may need to be moved or interacted with to progress further.

2. **Purpose and Narrative Role:**  
The image illustrates a transition point in the game "Black Myth: Wukong," following the cave exploration. It highlights the next obstacle—a cart blocking the narrow path—which the player must navigate to continue the journey. The carved stone faces emphasize the ominous tone of the setting.
